content:
Sure, here are some examples of test cases in a table format:

| Test Case ID | Test Scenario | Test Steps | Expected Result | Actual Result | Pass/Fail |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| TC001 | User registration | 1. Click on the Register button | User is directed to the registration page |  |  |
|  |  | 2. Fill in all required fields with valid data | User data is saved in the database |  |  |
|  |  | 3. Click on the Submit button | User is directed to the login page |  |  |
| TC002 | User login | 1. Click on the Login button | User is directed to the login page |  |  |
|  |  | 2. Enter valid login credentials (username and password) | User is directed to the dashboard page |  |  |
|  |  | 3. Click on the Login button | User is logged in |  |  |
| TC003 | Searching for notes based on branch and semester | 1. Click on the Notes button | User is directed to the Notes page |  |  |
|  |  | 2. Select the required branch and semester from the dropdown menu | Notes for the selected branch and semester are displayed |  |  |
|  |  | 3. Click on a specific subject to view notes for that subject | Notes for the selected subject are displayed in a new web page |  |  |
| TC004 | Posting a question in the Q&A forum | 1. Click on the Q&A button | User is directed to the Q&A forum page |  |  |
|  |  | 2. Click on the Ask a Question button | User is directed to a new web page to post the question |  |  |
|  |  | 3. Enter the question details and click on the Submit button | The question is posted in the Q&A forum and is visible to all users |  |  |
| TC005 | Applying for a job | 1. Click on the Job Info button | User is directed to the Job Info page |  |  |
|  |  | 2. Browse through the available job listings and select a job | User is directed to a new web page to apply for the job |  |  |
|  |  | 3. Fill in the job application form and click on the Submit button | The job application is sent to the employer for consideration |  |  |
